SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessKeys
Manages access keys and connection details for the database, primarily by retrieving them from environment variables.
Border
Represents a border.
Config
This class provides the configuration for the SocketIO server and manages related beans.
Coordinates
Represents a set of coordinates.
CreateGameController
This controller handles the creation of new games.
DataRetriever
Retrieves game data from the database.
DataUploader
This class is responsible for uploading game data to the database.
DBConnector
Connects to the database.
DbUtils
Provides utility functions for database operations.
Game
This class provides utility methods related to game logic.
GameData
GameData represents a game's data, including its borders, loot boxes, and other metadata.
GameDetails
Represents game details.
GameId
Represents a game id.
GameListController
This controller handles requests to get a list of available games.
GamePreviewRetriever
Retrieves game previews from the database.
GameProps
Represents the properties of a game.
InitialDataController
This controller handles requests to get initial game data for a specific game.
JoinController
This controller handles requests to join a game lobby.
JsonParser
A utility class for parsing game data from JSON format.
Lobby
Represents a game lobby, which manages connections of online users and keeps track of game state.
LobbyCode
Represents a lobby code.
LobbyController
This controller handles the creation and removal of game lobbies.
LobbyManager
This class manages all the lobbies in the game.
LobbyNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when a requested lobby is not found.
LoginCheck
Provides methods for checking user login credentials and login tokens.
LoginController
This controller handles user login requests.
LootBox
Represents a LootBox.
LootBox.Item
Represents an item that can be found in a LootBox.
MiddlePoint
Represents a middle point.
NullEnvironmentVariableException
This exception is thrown when a required environment variable is null.
Rank
Represents a rank in the system.
RoyaltisApiApplication
The main entry point for the Royaltis API application.
StartGameController
This controller handles requests to start a game.
TokenManager
Manages the creation and decryption of user tokens for authentication and authorization.
User
Represents a user in the game.
UserLogin
Represents a user login.
UserManager
This class manages all users in the game.
UserNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when a requested user is not found in the database.
